data.title: Tim Henman Multiple Choice Quiz
data.meta_description: This is a quiz devoted to the British tennis player Tim Henman. - test your knowledge in this quiz! (Author Linaw50)
data.text:
Quiz Answer Key and Fun Facts

1. When was Tim born?

Answer: 6th September 1974

Tim was born in Oxford, England.

2. Which other British tennis player does Tim share his birthday with (month and day)?

Answer: Greg Rusedski

Greg was also born on 6th September, however he was born in 1973, so is therefore one year older than Tim.

3. Tim has won Wimbledon before 2003?

Answer: False

Tim never won Wimbledon before 2003, however he had reached the semi-finals.

4. In which year did Tim marry his first wife Lucy?

Answer: 1999

Tim married Lucy on 11th December 1999.

5. When was Tim's daughter, Rosie born?

Answer: 19th October 2002

Rosie's full name is Rose Elizabeth.

6. What colour eyes does Tim have?

Answer: Hazel

Tim is 6'1 and weighs 170lbs.

7. In Wimbledon 2003, who did Tim beat to claim a place in the second round?

Answer: Thomas Zib

Alexander Waske was beaten in the first round by Greg Rusedski. Tim beat Thomas Zib 6-2, 7-6, 3-6, 6-1.

8. What is the name of Tim's black labrador in 2003?

Answer: Bonnie

Tim's horse was named Stella.

9. What was Tim's British rank in 2003?

Answer: One

Greg Rusedski was number two in Britain at that time.

10. How many aces did Tim serve in the first round at Wimbledon in 2003?

Answer: 17

Tim's opponent, Thomas Zib, served two aces during the match.

Source: Author Linaw50

This quiz was reviewed by FunTrivia editor Nightmare before going online.

Any errors found in FunTrivia content are routinely corrected through our feedback system.
